flows.name: Quick Phrase Practice A: User  S: User opens the language tutor app on smart watch S: User taps “Practice a Phrase” S: App prompts user to speak or select a phrase S: User speaks phrase they want to practice SYS: Match user with available tutor  D: Is a tutor available? E: D1 -> S5 [label=Yes] E: D1 -> END_EXIT [label=No]  S: Live audio session begins S: Tutor corrects pronunciation and provides feedback S: User repeats phrase  END: Session ends automatically after short duration EXIT: User cancels session early

Ask a Question A: User  S: User opens app from watch complication S: User taps “Ask a Question” S: App prompts user to speak question S: User asks contextual question (e.g., ordering food)  SYS: Request microphone permission if not granted  D: Is microphone permission granted? E: D2 -> S6 [label=Yes] E: D2 -> END_EXIT [label=No]  SYS: Connect user to tutor S: Tutor responds with explanation + example S: Tutor offers optional follow-up  D: Does user want more help? E: D3 -> S9 [label=Yes] E: D3 -> END [label=No]  S: App suggests continuing on phone SYS: Hand off session to mobile app  END: Question resolved EXIT: Network interruption

Scheduled Micro-Lesson A: User  S: User receives watch notification for scheduled session S: User taps “Join Lesson” SYS: Connect to tutor session  D: Is connection stable? E: D4 -> S4 [label=Yes] E: D4 -> S5 [label=No]  S: Tutor leads short structured exercise S: User responds verbally SYS: Provide haptic or visual cues for turns  D: Is session exceeding watch-friendly duration? E: D5 -> S8 [label=Yes] E: D5 -> END [label=No]  S: App suggests switching to phone SYS: Transition session to mobile app  END: Lesson completed EXIT: User skips or postpones lesson

personas.name: Traveler Learner
personas.details: wants quick language help while navigating a foreign country

personas.name: Busy Professional
personas.details: wants short, focused practice sessions between meetings

personas.name: Language Beginner
personas.details: wants reassurance, corrections, and simple explanations

personas.name: Advanced Learner
personas.details: wants nuanced phrasing, pronunciation feedback, and cultural tips

personas.name: Tutor
personas.details: wants to deliver helpful micro-lessons without context switching

personas.name: Privacy-Conscious User
personas.details: wants control over audio recording and session history

personas.name: Casual Listener
personas.details: wants a low-pressure, no-judgment karaoke experience

personas.name: Karaoke Host
personas.details: wants to start a session fast and invite friends easily

personas.name: Friend Participant
personas.details: wants to join instantly and understand what to do next

personas.name: Competitive Singer
personas.details: wants scoring and performance feedback (optional)

personas.name: Social Sharer
personas.details: wants results or clips to share after a session

personas.name: Privacy-Conscious User
personas.details: wants control over mic usage and recording

personas.name: Privacy-Conscious User
personas.details: wants control over audio recording and session history

personas.name: Casual Listener
personas.details: wants a fun, low-pressure way to sing along without needing talent

personas.name: Karaoke Host
personas.details: wants to start a session fast and invite friends with minimal setup

personas.name: Friend Participant
personas.details: wants to join instantly from an invite link and know what to do next

personas.name: Competitive Singer
personas.details: wants scoring, stats, and bragging rights (optional mode)

personas.name: Social Sharer
personas.details: wants clips/screenshots/results to share after the session

personas.name: Privacy-Conscious User
personas.details: wants control over microphone use and recording, with clear consent

assumptions: Users are willing to engage in very short (30s–5min) live tutor interactions on a smart watch without prior preparation.
Tutors are available frequently enough across time zones to support near-real-time connections for micro-sessions.
Small latency is acceptable in group sessions
Small latency is acceptable in group sessions

16 swimlanes: User, Host, Guest, , Traveler Learner, Busy Professional, Language Beginner, Advanced Learner, Tutor, Privacy-Conscious User, Casual Listener, Karaoke Host, Friend Participant, Competitive Singer, Social Sharer, System
openQuestions: Are sessions recorded or ephemeral by default?
Do tutors see user location/context (city, country)?
Can users request the same tutor repeatedly for micro-sessions?
What is the max recommended session length on watch?
Do we support text input at all on watch?
How do we price or meter ultra-short tutor interactions?
What happens if tutor availability is low?
How much context should persist between sessions?
Is audio recorded or purely live?
Is group playback strict-sync or best-effort?
Is a host required at all times?
Do we support duets or rotating solos?
Should sessions support video, or audio-only, or lyrics-only?
Do we support scoring in v1? If yes, what model and what feedback UI?
Where does Karaoke live in the Spotify IA (song page, now playing, search)?
How do we handle explicit lyrics / content controls in group sessions?
What is the max participant count for a good experience?
What is the max participant count for a good experience?
Is audio recorded or purely live?
Is group playback strict-sync or best-effort?
Is a host required at all times?
Do we support duets or rotating solos?
Should sessions support video, or audio-only, or lyrics-only?
Do we support scoring in v1? If yes, what model and what feedback UI?
Where does Karaoke live in the Spotify IA (song page, now playing, search)?
How do we handle explicit lyrics / content controls in group sessions?
What is the max participant count for a good experience?
What is the max participant count for a good experience?
Are sessions recorded or ephemeral by default?
Do tutors see user location/context (city, country)?
Can users request the same tutor repeatedly for micro-sessions?
What is the max recommended session length on watch?
Do we support text input at all on watch?
How do we price or meter ultra-short tutor interactions?
What happens if tutor availability is low?
How much context should persist between sessions?
Do we record audio at all, or is it a purely live sing-along experience?
Is With Friends playback truly synchronized or “best-effort” with tolerance?
Do we need a host at all times, or can sessions be hostless?
Do we support duets / rotating solo lines, or everyone sings everything?
Should sessions support video, or audio-only, or lyrics-only?
Do we support scoring in v1? If yes, what model and what feedback UI?
Where does Karaoke live in the Spotify IA (song page, now playing, search)?
How do we handle explicit lyrics / content controls in group sessions?
What is the max participant count for a good experience?
risks: Network instability may interrupt live audio sessions, degrading the learning experience or causing frequent exits.
Smart watch screen and input constraints may limit users’ ability to understand feedback or corrections from tutors.
Low tutor availability during peak travel hours could result in repeated failed connection attempts, increasing user frustration.
